ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua (Water, Eau), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Behenyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hexanediol, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Rubus Chamaemorus Fruit Extract, Allantoin, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Triceteareth-4 Phosphate, Carbomer, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Hydroxyacetophenone.
